mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_DATA (post_id, store_id, content, picture_file, customer_id, createDate) VALUES (#{post.id}, #{store.id}, #{content}, #{pictureFile}, #{user.id}, #{createDate})
mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.post_id as "post.id", a.store_id as "store.id", a.content as content, a.picture_file as pictureFile, s.name as "store.name", s.address as "store.address", AVG(r.rating) as averageRating from POST_DATA a join STORES s on a.store_id = s.id join REVIEWS r on s.id = r.store_id where a.post_id = #{id} group by a.id, a.post_id, a.store_id, a.content, a.picture_file, s.name, s.address;
